title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\PySparkBatch
name: PySparkBatch
description:
A configuration for running an Apache PySpark batch workload.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.PySparkBatch

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.main_python_file_uri
params.description: Required. The HCFS URI of the main Python file to use as the Spark driver. Must be a .py file.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Optional. The arguments to pass to the driver. Do not include arguments that can be set as batch properties, such as --conf, since a collision can occur that causes an incorrect batch submission.

params.name: data.python_file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS file URIs of Python files to pass to the PySpark framework. Supported file types: .py, .egg, and .zip.

params.name: data.jar_file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of jar files to add to the classpath of the Spark driver and tasks.

params.name: data.file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of files to be placed in the working directory of each executor.

params.name: data.archive_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of archives to be extracted into the working directory of each executor. Supported file types: .jar, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, and .zip.
